function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases like influenza, COVID-19, SARS, MERS, H5N1, Nipah, and Ebola","Impact":"High mortality rates, strain on healthcare systems, economic disruption","Mitigation":"Enhanced hygiene protocols, rapid response plans, global surveillance and cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccines, antiviral drugs, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, travelers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, international health agencies"},{"Description":"Failure in containing outbreaks, political mismanagement, and manipulated media coverage","Impact":"Increased spread of disease, misinformation, loss of trust in authorities","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, effective leadership, public health education","Technologies":"Information dissemination tools, crisis management systems","People":"General population, government officials, media professionals","Owner":"Government, media organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Illicit trade of wildlife meat and potential fecal-oral transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission to humans","Mitigation":"Regulation of wildlife trade, enforcement of food safety standards, research on zoonotic diseases","Technologies":"DNA testing for wildlife species, monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Wildlife traders, public health agencies, researchers","Owner":"Government authorities, wildlife conservation organizations, public health agencies"}]}
